node.text:
Featuring all your favorite tropical fruits and of course I had to go all out by making some Harmless Harvest Strawberry Coconut Pearls for extra excitement!  See below for the recipe!
⠀
Sunset Harvest
⠀
Recipe
* 1oz Harmless Harvest Coconut Water
* 1.5oz Vodka
* 2tbs Mango Coconut Purée
* .5oz Fresh Lime Juice
* .25oz Spicy Passionfruit Purée
* Harmless Harvest Strawberry Coconut Pearls 
Garnish: Habanero & Mint Sprigs
⠀
Method
    1. Add all ingredients except pearl into tin
    2. Shake until chilled
    3. Add pearls to bottom of stemmed goblet
    4. Fill glass with crushed ice
    5. Pour cocktail into glass
    6. Add garnish
⠀
#HarmlessHarvest #Ad #BADBIRDY MSG21+

node.title: Your weekend cocktail is here with my friends at @harmlessharvest

node.text:
We’re back again with another incredible recipe with @harmlessharvest Coconut Smoothie! 🤤

Raise your hand if you’re a chocolate dipped banana lover! 🙋🏻‍♀️ The Harmless Harvest Coconut Smoothie is absolutely delicious and the perfect ingredient to add some rich body to your cocktail. See below for  recipe, it’s perfect for that dessert craving! 🥥🍌🍫
⠀
“Peeling Cute”
1oz Harmless Harvest Coconut Smoothie
1.5oz Aged Rum
.5oz Banana Syrup
.25oz Coffee Concentrate
3 Dashes Cacao Bitters
⠀
Garnish: Chocolate Dipped Glass, Grated Nutmeg
⠀
#HarmlessHarvest #Ad #BADBIRDY MSG21+

node.text:
We’re wrapping up #Pride celebrations with @perrierusa
⠀
This week, I #CheersTo Unity with my original Perrier drink, Earthchild 🌎
⠀
I’m deeply inspired by my global followers. I cheers to them and our unity! My page has reached all corners of the world, so I’ve had a glimpse into many cultures, traditions, backgrounds and views - and the common thread has been unity. The idea that I have been given a platform to share my passion, the love I share with my wife, as well as my art with the world has fueled me to keep reaching outside of being a bartender. It has made me want to do my part in giving back and being a role model to everyone in the LGBTQ community and beyond.
⠀
Stay tuned for a special celebratory unity post from @HippyPotter on @perrierusa
⠀
Try the Earthchild at home and let me know what you think! 21+, please drink responsibly.
⠀
Earthchild
3-4oz Perrier Lime
1.5oz Elderflower Liqueur
.75oz Lime Juice
.5oz Green Tea Syrup
Handful of Mint
2 dashes of Lime Bitters
⠀
Method:
1. Add all ingredients except Perrier to shaker
2. Add ice and shake well
3. Double-Strain into glass
4. Add ice and top with Perrier Lime
⠀
Glassware: Highball
Ice: Crushed
Garnish: Green Tea Sugar Bowl with Mint Crystals or a simple lime wheel
⠀
📌How To:
Green Tea Syrup:
1. 1tbs of green tea
2. 1 cup of hot water
3. Steep for 10 minutes
4. Double strain and add equal parts sugar
5. Stir until dissolved
⠀
#SparkOriginality #AD #BADBIRDY #Perrier @PerrierUSA

node.text:
This week, to keep the #Pride celebrations going with @perrierusa , I #CheersTo Acceptance with my original Perrier drink Sunbeam ☀️
⠀
Pride month is a celebration of the LGBTQIA and all of those who support equality in our community. I cheers to Acceptance and celebrate all of you! Acceptance of self as well as those who support equality within our community is key. As a member of the LBGTQIA community I know how hard, scary and alienating coming out can be to friends and family. Your ability to wear the crown of acceptance is your right. Grant acceptance to yourself, stand tall, fix your crown, conquer and do it all with dignity and love.
⠀
Stay tuned for a celebratory acceptance post from @readytostare on @perrierusa ⭐️
⠀
Sunbeam
3-4oz Perrier Pink Grapefruit
1oz Cacao-infused Orange Liqueur
.5oz Tangelo Juice
.5oz Lime Juice
.25oz Orange Honey
2 dashes of Aromatic Bitters
Orange Peel Essence
⠀
Method:
1. Add all ingredients except Perrier to shaker
2. Add ice and shake well
3. Double-Strain into glass
4. Add ice and top with Perrier Grapefruit
5. Express orange oils
⠀
Glassware: Stemmed Goblet
Ice: Crushed
Garnish: Mandarinquat Dipped In Chocolate Sugar Glass
⠀
#SparkOriginality #Perrier #AD #BADBIRDY @perrierusa

node.text:
It’s National Bourbon Day and I’m so honored to be celebrating with @saintcloudbourbon 🤤
⠀
Saint Cloud is a beautifully crafted bourbon by Ray Walker who I have the pleasure to call my friend. His experience in wine making has truly set the stage for the success of his exceptional whiskey. 👏🏼
⠀
See below for a very special recipe I’ve made in honor of Saint Cloud on National Bourbon Day! 🥃☁️
⠀
p.s. yes the glass is covered in edible 24K GOLD 😉
⠀
👇🏼👇🏼👇🏼
⠀
🥃“Saint & Sinner”
▪️2oz Saint Cloud Bourbon
▪️.75oz Italian Sweet Vermouth
▪️.5oz Biscotti Liqueur
▪️Bar-spoon of Salted Caramel Syrup
▪️4 dashes of Fig & Fennel Bitters
⠀
✔️Glass: Double Old Fashioned
✔️Garnish: Painted Edible 24k Gold, Cherry & Orange Peel
⠀
#SaintCloudBourbon #BADBIRDY #ad 21+ #NationalBourbonDay

node.text:
I’m teaming up with my friends at @perrierusa to create original Perrier drinks to celebrate pride! This week I #CheersTo Self-Love with the Lover’s Kiss 💋
⠀
My idea of self-love is deep-rooted in the notion of it being a love that inwardly reflects but is outwardly dispersed to the world. Having #Pride is about being proud of who you are. Granting myself self-love has gifted me armor from the judgment of others. I cheers to Self-Love and your ability to find that special space within. I believe that you cannot freely and fully love without granting yourself that special honor first. Prioritizing one’s growth and fostering that inner love is the gateway to all that can catapult you as a human being.
⠀
Stay tuned for a celebratory self-love post special post from @plastiquetiara on @perrierusa 👑
⠀
And check out my original Perrier recipe below. 21+, Please Drink Responsibly.
⠀
Lover’s Kiss 💋
3-4oz Perrier Strawberry
1oz Almond Liqueur
.5oz Lemon Juice
.5oz Simple Syrup
Muddled Strawberries
4 Basil Leaves
2 dashes of Aromatic Bitters
⠀
Method:
1. Add strawberries and simply syrup to shaker and muddle
2. Add remaining ingredients except Perrier to shaker
3. Add ice and shake well
4. Double-Strain into glass
5. Add ice and top with Perrier Strawberry
⠀
Glassware: Double Old Fashioned
Ice: Crushed
Garnish: Strawberry Sugar Nest
⠀
#Perrier #SparkOriginality #AD #BADBIRDY @perrierusa

node.text:
One of the greatest honors in this industry is the opportunity to support my fellow Barmen and Barwomen. 🙏🏼My friend and incredibly accomplished Barman @brunovanzan_official has released his new collection of Bar Tools @innovative_bar_tools and I am excited to share them with you! 🤩 Bruno remains a great inspiration in the bar community and I was honored when he gave me the opportunity to represent his brand. 🙌🏼
⠀
These tools are made with the bartender in mind. The 4Pezzi Continental Shaker comes with an optional fine mesh strainer that is secured with a screw mechanism. The weight and material of the shaker is flawless and it is beautifully engraved.  Bruno's barspoon set comes with interchangeable tops that include a trident, muddler and mini jigger.  I look forward to adding this collection to my bar and Congratulations to my friend Bruno on his beautiful equipment!
⠀
See below for recipe!
⠀
"Duchessa"
1.5oz Single Malt Scotch
.75oz Lillet Rouge
.75oz Lemon
.25oz Demerara
2 Dashes of Violet & Elderberry Bitters
Mint Leaves
⠀
#BrunoVanzan #InnovativeBarTools #BADBIRDY #YourHeadBartender #LA
#cocktails #cocktail #bartend #bartending #bartender #liquor #whiskey #liqpic #tequila #vodka #gin #rum #cognac #drink #tw50bc #drinkpunch

node.text:
I am so honored to be teaming up with @Hennessy to bring you this amazing winter cocktail, “There’s Always Thyme.” Hennessy is one of my favorite spirits to have, especially during the winter months! This cocktail is perfect to share with your friends and family this season. See the recipe below and make sure to watch the video for tips and tricks on how to create your own syrups at home using the freshest ingredients available. Cheers!
⠀
“There’s Always Thyme”
·      1.5 oz Hennessy V.S.O.P Privilège
·      1 oz Thyme Apricot Honey Syrup
·      0.75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice
·      1 dash black walnut bitters
·      Barspoon Almond Liqueur  
⠀
Step 1: Combine all liquids in a cocktail shaker with ice.
Step 2: Shake until well chilled.
Step 3: Strain over fresh ice in a rocks glass.

PLEASE DRINK RESPONSIBLY 
⠀
#hennessy partner (ad message for 21+) #HennessyVSOP #HennessyMix

node.text:
It’s rare that I get a chance to make a cocktail for my grandparents since they live in Miami and they tend not to drink as much as they’ve gotten older. 

This was a special day though as my wife and I were celebrating our anniversary and my grandparents were in town to visit. I’ve been taking the time lately to ask members of my family all sorts of questions, making a record of it and one day I’ll pass down the “Family Tree” book to my nephews for them to continue the story as our family grows.

One of the questions I asked my grandma was what her favorite spirit was and to my surprise she answered Whiskey! Not only does she love Whiskey but, she likes it neat! 😅 

I thought to myself what better cocktail to make her than an Old Fashioned! 🥃 

Her reaction was priceless and this is a moment I will never forget. I was able to share a piece of what I love to do with my grandma and she truly enjoyed it down to the last drop!

Cheers everyone I hope you’re enjoying this beautiful Saturday! These are the moments I live for with my family. 

#LatinHeritageMonth #BADBIRDY #YourHeadBartender #LA
#cocktails #bartender #liqpic

@licensed_to_distill @whistlepigwhiskey 
@pinabarware 
@bellagemanails

node.text:
If you’ve seen my last post you know that this whimsical cocktail is called Gumdrop Cuppycake! 😂 This magical cocktail features @malahatspirits White Rum infused with Bubblegum 🍬 a Bubblegum essence filled bubble made with my new @theflavourblaster and wrapped up in a blanket of home made cotton candy 🍭 Come and get it, only inside @johnthomasandson 🎥 @jessemrichmond 🎵 @longlivejax Jax Yohana - Feel 
Check out my boy Jax on Spotify! 🥃 @pinabarware Bar Tools

A special thanks to my brother-in-law and sister-in-law for letting me use their beautiful space! 😘 @suzettestyle @bryanelms_
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

node.text:
In celebration of Bee’s Knees Week I had the amazing opportunity to visit @thevalleyhive Apiary to learn all about the intricate life of the bee’s and their importance to our ecosystem.
⠀
Once we harvested some honey we teamed up with @barrhillgin to make some incredibly fresh cocktails.
⠀
A special thank you to the entire crew involved!
⠀
@barrhillgin 
@thevalleyhive 
@licensed_to_distill 
@86.thebartender 
@jasonfyu 
@cocktailsbyhawk 
⠀
Queen Bee’s Knees 👑
2oz Barr Hill Gin
.75oz Lemon
.75oz Almond & Elderflower infused Honey Syrup
Young Horseradish Leaf
⠀
Method:
1. Add all ingredients to tin
2. Add ice and shake well
3. Double strain into coupe
⠀
Thank you so much to the team over at The Valley Hive Apiary for their hospitality. The work you all do is so incredibly important and the bees are lucky to have you! Can’t wait for the next visit!

node.text:
Featuring all your favorite tropical fruits and of course I had to go all out by making some Harmless Harvest Strawberry Coconut Pearls for extra excitement!  See below for the recipe!
⠀
Sunset Harvest
⠀
Recipe
* 1oz Harmless Harvest Coconut Water
* 1.5oz Vodka
* 2tbs Mango Coconut Purée
* .5oz Fresh Lime Juice
* .25oz Spicy Passionfruit Purée
* Harmless Harvest Strawberry Coconut Pearls 
Garnish: Habanero & Mint Sprigs
⠀
Method
    1. Add all ingredients except pearl into tin
    2. Shake until chilled
    3. Add pearls to bottom of stemmed goblet
    4. Fill glass with crushed ice
    5. Pour cocktail into glass
    6. Add garnish
⠀
#HarmlessHarvest #Ad #BADBIRDY MSG21+

node.text:
Thank you all for the love on my previous video on how to get crispy lines on sugar/salt rims! 🥰 I couldn’t let the glass go to waste so I decided to make one of my all time favorite Cognac cocktails, the Sidecar! 🤤
⠀
This cocktail was created in Paris during World War I and named after the motorcycle sidecar 🏍
⠀
This cocktail is so perfect and the sugar rim just compliments it so well. This recipe is perfect to make at home and only requires 3 ingredients. See below for recipe! 👇🏼
⠀
Sidecar
2oz Cognac
.75oz Cointreau
.75oz Lemon Juice
Sugar Rim
⠀
💡 What do you want to learn to make next?!
⠀
#BADBIRDY #YourHeadBartender #LA
#cocktails #cocktail #bartend #bartending #bartender #liquor #whiskey #liqpic #tequila #vodka #gin #rum #cognac #drink #tw50bc #drinkpunch #sidecar

node.text:
I’ve been getting asked a lot how I get such clean lines on my sugar and salt rims. So here it is! 🙌

Some painters tape, honey and sugar! 🍯 Obviously this is very time consuming for it to be practical in a bar setting but, it’s great for at home and for photos! 📸 

I hope you liked this tip! Stay tuned to see what cocktail I pour into this sugar dipped glass! 

#BADBIRDY #YourHeadBartender #LA
#cocktails #cocktail #bartend #bartending #bartender #liquor #whiskey #liqpic #tequila #vodka #gin #rum #cognac #drink #tw50bc #drinkpunch

node.text:
Happy National Rum Day from my friends @therealmccoyrum and I! 🥳 Rum holds such a special place in my ❤️. It is my family’s favorite spirit, what we celebrate with at all our family events. It is the base spirit of my favorite cocktail, the Mojito! It is the national spirit of my Cuban heritage.
⠀
Rum is rich in history and The Real McCoy embodies just that. 😍
⠀
I’m proud to raise a glass with all of you, Cheers to @therealmccoyrum !🥃
⠀
#TheRealMcCoy #NationalRumDay #BADBIRDY #AD #MSGfor21+ #Rum

node.text:
That Drip Tho 💧🤤
⠀
